thread.section_title: Store DJ Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Store DJ | storedj.com.au | 3 of 402
thread.title: PTesh

author: PTesh
title: PTesh
text:
Jack from the Melbourne StudioDJ store contacted me personally to inform me that their product which I had ordered has unfortunately gone out of stock. None the less, he made sure that I knew and understood going forward that I could have the option to be refunded, or to wait it out. I chose the latter. He then offered me an express shipping option free of charge to help as they were ordering from their supplier in a few days.
Extremely great person, easy to talk to, and most importantly great service. Dude deserves a raise (If anyone at StoreDJ is reading this haha)
